    • Constructor Detail

      • SimulationControlImpl

        public SimulationControlImpl(TraciService traciService,
                             double sumoStepLength,
                             int maxVeh,
                             Situation situation)
                      throws NoIntersectionInSituationException,
                             NoValidRoutesInSituationException,
                             TraciException
        Parameters:
        traciService - traci service
        sumoStepLength - simulation step length
        maxVeh - limit for vehicle count
        situation - infrastructure for simulation
        Throws:
        NoIntersectionInSituationException - when there are no intersections present in infrastructure
        NoValidRoutesInSituationException - when there are no valid routes present in infrastructure
        TraciException - when some of the traci calls fails
